QuestData.Title: Restorative Venom
QuestData.Description:
Meerah here found your friend in the dunes. The lightning strike nearly killed her. It might still, without treatment.
The wasps within the grove have a painful sting, but their venom also has restorative properties.
I can extract what I need from their glands.
With an ample amount of venom, we should be able to soothe your friend's wounds.
